title: 820-02098 crash after password pass
message:
M1 14” with weird problem
No water damage and not any looking damage..
Mac can work perfect and suddenly it crash and or not turn on at all, or after few minutes hours, it turn on just when charger connecting, get to the password slot, type the password press enter and boom shout off…try everything, Revive, Restore, take all the flat cables..nothing, or dead and not turn on, or turn on and crash after password, or working great until next time 🤷🏻‍♂️
Any idea?!?

title: 820-02098 crash after password pass
message: Did you test in safe mode?

title: 820-02098 crash after password pass
message:
yes,the same..
after it shout off its show 5V 0A(PPBUS 12v) until i disconnect the battery and connect again and it turn on when i connect the charger..and the after the password enter its off again..

title: 820-02098 crash after password pass
message: Go to Apple if is still covered by warranty...
